subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The former tight end for the Green Bay Packers and the Detroit Lions was a two-time all-American at the University of Michigan who became one of the first outstanding tight ends in the National Football League.
snippet: The former tight end for the Green Bay Packers and the Detroit Lions was a two-time all-American at the University of Michigan who became one of the first outstanding tight ends in the National Football League.
